Spot.desc: Attempt to spot any concealed enemy units within this crewman's Field of View.

Direct Movement.desc: Direct the movement of the vehicle, adding a bonus to successfully move or go HD.

Direct Fire.desc: Direct fire against enemy targets, adding a bonus to hit or affect.

Smoke Grenade.desc: Throw a smoke-emitting grenade out of the vehicle. Must be CE.

Command Battlegroup.desc: Issue a new command to your battlegroup. Will not change the default command for the combat day.

Operate Gun.desc: Operate any gun available to this position. Can also unjam a jammed gun.

Operate MG.desc: Operate any MG available to this position, other than AA MGs. Can also unjam a jammed MG.

Operate AAMG.desc: Operate any AAMG from this position. Can also unjam a jammed AAMG.

Operate Flame Thrower.desc: Operate any flame thrower from this position. Can also unjam a jammed weapon.

Reload.desc: Assist in reloading the main gun, increasing chance of maintaining Rate of Fire.

Manage Ready Rack.desc: Move ammo to/from the Ready Rack

Drive.desc: Move forward or backward, pivot hull, attempt to gain Hull Down, or reposition within the same hex.

Drive Into Terrain.desc: Move forward or backward, pivot hull, attempt to gain Hull Down, or reposition within the same hex. For forward/backward moves, will prompt for a desired terrain type.

Withdraw.desc: Attempt to withdraw from the battle, moving into an adjacent map hex on the Campaign Day map.

Pass Ammo.desc: Pass ammo up to the Loader, increasing chance of RoF if the Ready Rack is not used.

Abandon Vehicle.desc: All crew bail out of the vehicle and retreat to friendly lines.

First Aid.desc: Patch up fresh injuries on oneself or other crewman, or stabilize a Critical injury.

Swap Position.desc: Swap positions in the vehicle with another crewman, or take up a vacant position.

Fire Smoke Mortar.desc: Fire the smoke mortar, creating concealing smoke in front of the turret.

Fire Small Arms.desc: Fire small arms weapons at any spotted, non-vehicle targets within 1 hex.

Hunker Down.desc: Stay low and out of sight while CE. No effect if BU.
